mean_en: all the people who live in a particular area or place; a group of people who are similar in some way; (biology) a group of plants and animals growing or living in the same place or environment
sentence: The largest Chinese community in this city lives in its Chinatown.
sentence_trans: 唐人街里住着这座城市最庞大的华人群体。
word_etyma: com共同 + mun公共的 + ity状态 → 公共状态 → community社区
